fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Consumers, Environment, Research and innovation, Transport
eu_initiatives:
Rail reform, specifically 4th Railway Package 
 
Digital Single Market 
 
Multi-modal travel information consultation 
 
Stakeholder consultation on rail passengers' rights and obligations 
 
PSI Directive
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
We are a European-based independent digital rail platform company that seeks to promote rail travel by building and marketing leading solutions for European customers to plan and book their rail travel via mobile and website channels.  
 
Our mission is:  
 
To help customers make smarter journeys every day, and save them time hassle and money;  
 
To champion rail as the smarter mode of transport; to deliver incremental customers to our Train Company Partners.
position: General Counsel and Director of Regulatory Affairs
